bug.author: Yancey1989
bug.summary: scorecard tutorial print invalid scorecard result
bug.description: The TRAIN statement in scorecard tutorial should print a scorecard result table in the log cell, but the latest code outputs an empty result, just like the following screenshot: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1426912/96368897-3312e480-1189-11eb-95d3-d0e77a17f160.png></denchmark-link>
